resources.string: You can start broadcasting 30 minutes before session start time..
There is still time to start broadcasting, you can test till then..

string-array.name: intro_text
string-array.item: InstaLively gives you the power of going Live on the move
Google sign in syncs up with your YouTube account
Share your experience with the world via social media

resources.string: InstaLively syncs with your Youtube account. And Youtube requires you to verify that account is in good standing to Livestream.
This is a ONE-TIME VERIFICATION PROCESS. Please bear with it just once. Its worth it, we promise!

These terms regarding live streaming (the "Terms") are for you, the content provider that has contracted with Google ("You"), through the Content License Agreement, Content Hosting Services Agreement, Sound Recording and Audiovisual Agreement, Channel Distribution Agreement and/or the YouTube Terms of Service (any of which are referred to below as the "Agreement"). Through the live streaming account feature, You may live stream content (the "Live Content") through Your YouTube channel and You may be provided with the option of archiving the Live Content for subsequent viewing (the "Archived Content"). The Live Content must comply with the YouTube Community Guidelines. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in the Agreement, You represent and warrant that You have all necessary rights for the exploitation of the Live Content on the Google Services throughout the world, including, without limitation, music licensing rights from artists, record labels, publishers (including public performance licenses) and any other royalty participants. You agree to comply with all applicable laws, rules and regulations regarding the Live Content. The Live Content and the Archived Content, if any, will constitute "Provider Content," "Original Channel Content," or "Your Content" as applicable, pursuant to your Agreement with Google and are subject to the terms of that Agreement.
Discover nearby content or watch popular streams.
Interact with creators and follow to them.
Tilt your phone to go Live.
Share public streams on your social network.
Streams get saved on your youtube channel.
Share private streams with the people you want.
Protected content not supported on API levels below 18
This device does not support the required DRM scheme
Items posted are broadcasted to friends for 24 hrs
Messages disappear forever after a fixed time
No members yet, please select a few friends
Who do you want to share your moments with?
Tap to view Stream. Double tap to Chat
+ Add Photos and Videos To Your Stream
You must define the group name

Set a priority for the data at this database location. A priority can be either a number or a string and is used to provide a custom ordering for the children at a location (if no priorities are specified, the children are ordered by name). This ordering affects the enumeration order of DataSnapshot.forEach() as well as the prevChildName parameter passed to child_added and child_moved events. You cannot set a priority on an empty location. For this reason, setWithPriority() should be used when setting initial data with a specific priority, and setPriority() should be used when updating the priority of existing data.
Allow Pulse to access this device location?
Reduce Pulse’s mobile data usage. Just tap\nto load content like Moments and Streams\nwhen you’re on the go.
Photos and videos you’ve taken will be\nsaved automatically to the Camera roll.
This is how you appear on Pulse, so pick a name your friends know you by.
Choose carefully - you can only change your\nbirthday a limited number of times.

Adds an indicator next to your name on your birthday,
allows friends to send you Birthday Moments,
and some other fun surprises. This does not
reveal your age to other Users.

You are responsible for ensuring all content included
in a Pulse Stream initiated by you complies with
this Agreement, including content provided by other
participants who may join you in the Stream. Please
choose participants you wish to include to this stream
carefully.

Under no circumstances is Pulse to be held liable
for any content that is created by you and also for the
issues in streaming caused by network issues, camera
quality, phone compatibility or all of the above.
Pulse also holds rights to block or delete your
account if it believes that your account is being used
for malicious or unlawful purposes.

By using Pulse, you accept and agree to be bound
by the Pulse terms of service.
